GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.33 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
mxser: fix xmit_buf leak in activate when LSR == 0xff

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 2cd05c38a27bee7fb42aa4d43174d68ac55dac0f, it was introduced in version v2.6.33 by commit 6769140d304731f0a3b177470a2adb4bacd9036b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mxser: fix xmit_buf leak in activate when LSR == 0xff
